title: Handle Request to Speak to a Supervisor
description: A customer is unhappy with a policy and demands to be escalated to a supervisor.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the customer's frustration and their request for a supervisor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent responds empathetically and agrees to the escalation.

tasks.description: Check the availability of a supervisor or team lead.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees that a supervisor is available for a warm transfer.

tasks.description: Summarize the issue in a note and initiate a transfer to the available supervisor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a concise summary for the supervisor and successfully transfers the call.
